item.description:
Remember those fabulous lyrics from Diamonds are a Girl's Best Friend? "There may come a time when a Lass needs a Lawyer...."

Attorney Dayanna Moreno will speak with us about the 10 important legal issues in every woman's life: Prenups, Marriage, Divorce, Wills, Estate Plans, Child Custody, Buying Homes, and other vital legal matters.

You (quite literally!) CAN'T AFFORD to miss this Meetup!

As usual, snacks will be provided. Please pay on-line, if possible, to keep me from having to take up precious meeting time by collecting money. Please bring LOTS of business cards so that you can network with the other attendees, and one left over for the raffle.

See you there!
item.name: 10 Things Every Woman Should Know....
